articles.title: 120 land and environmental defenders killed or disappeared in Latin America last year, report finds - AP News
articles.description: A report by Global Witness reveals that at least 146 land and environmental defenders have been killed or gone missing worldwide in 2024. Over 80% of these cases occurred in Latin America. The report, released Wednesday, highlights Colombia as the deadliest c…
articles.content: BOGOTA, Colombia (AP) At least 146 land and environmental defenders were killed or have gone missing around the world in 2024, with more than 80% of those cases in Latin America, according to a repor… [+5011 chars]
